Package com.bitpay.sdk.model.bill

Class Bill

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bitpay.sdk.model.bill.Bill
  • public class Bill
extends Object

    Bills are payment requests addressed to specific buyers.

    Bill line items have fixed prices, typically denominated in fiat currency.

    See Also:
    REST API Bills

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Bill()
      Constructor, create an empty Bill object.
      Bill​(String number, String currency, String email, List<Item> items)
      Constructor, create a minimal request Bill object.

      Gets Bill recipient's name.

      Gets if set to true, BitPay's processing fee will be included in the amount charged on the invoice.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bill

        public Bill()
        Constructor, create an empty Bill object.

      • Bill

        public Bill​(String number,
            String currency,
            String email,
            List<Item> items)
        Constructor, create a minimal request Bill object.
        Parameters:
        number - A string for tracking purposes.
        currency - The three digit currency type used to compute the bill's amount.
        email - The email address of the receiver for this bill.
        items - The list of itens to add to this bill.

    • Method Detail

      • getToken

        public String getToken()

        Gets API token for bill resource.

        This token is actually derived from the API token used to create the bill and is tied to the specific resource id created.

        Returns:
        the token

      • setToken

        public void setToken​(String token)

        Sets API token for bill resource.

        This token is actually derived from the API token used to create the bill and is tied to the specific resource id created.

        Parameters:
        token - the token

      • getCurrency

        public String getCurrency()
        Gets ISO 4217 3-character currency code. This is the currency associated with the price field
        Returns:
        the currency

      • setCurrency

                 throws BitPayException

        Parameters:
        currency - the currency
        Throws:
